author: plynch
msg: Adding the core guts of a new webserver plugin. Using this plugin users can install and control a webserver instance, without having to install the whole thing everytime. Currently gets past bootstrap...
ServerStartedCheckTag - A jelly bean that checks a server's status and sets a property indicating the started status.
apache-2.x.jelly - a xml external entity jelly script that will contain a control implementation for apache 2.x
plugin.properties - the default properties for this plugin
